EmailTemplate.name: Email when is live with Foundation Direct OTT
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Onboarding__c.Account__c} is live with Foundation Direct OTT effective {!Onboarding__c.OTT_Actual_Launch_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Accounting,
{!Onboarding__c.Account__c} is live with Foundation Direct OTT effective {!Onboarding__c.OTT_Actual_Launch_Date__c}
Thanks
Foundation Direct Support
support@info.foundationdirect.com
